languages.text: "Да. Я ценил ее, пока она не зашла слишком далеко в своих попытках избавиться от меня. Она ценила меня, пока я не отказался молча подставить горло под клинок. Отношения зашли в тупик. Осталось лишь перерубить этот узел".

"Yes. I valued her until she went too far in her attempts to dispose of me. She valued me until I refused to bare my throat for the blade without a word. Our relationship has come to a dead end. Now the tie between us must be severed."
languages.original_text: "Да. Я ценил ее, пока она не зашла слишком далеко в своих попытках избавиться от меня. Она ценила меня, пока я не отказался молча подставить горло под клинок. Отношения зашли в тупик. Осталось лишь перерубить этот узел".

traits.locale_text: "Yes. I valued her until she went too far in her attempts to dispose of me. She valued me until I refused to bare my throat for the blade without a word. Our relationship has come to a dead end. Now the tie between us must be severed."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “是啊，我原本一直都很珍视她，可她却一门心思想除掉我，已经跨过了红线。她原本也一直都很珍视我，可我却拒绝毫无怨言地任她宰割。我们的关系已经走上了死路，如今，我必须切断我们之间的纽带了。”
languages.original_text: "Yes. I valued her until she went too far in her attempts to dispose of me. She valued me until I refused to bare my throat for the blade without a word. Our relationship has come to a dead end. Now the tie between us must be severed."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，我原本一直都很珍视她，可她却一门心思想除掉我，已经跨过了红线。她原本也一直都很珍视我，可我却拒绝毫无怨言地任她宰割。我们的关系已经走上了死路，如今，我必须切断我们之间的纽带了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「あぁ。奴が大胆にも俺を処分しようとするまで、俺は奴を大事にしていた。俺が黙って喉にかかる刃を拒むまで、奴は俺を大事にしていた。俺達の関係はどうにもならないとこまで来ちまった。もうこの絆は絶たなければならない」
languages.original_text: "Yes. I valued her until she went too far in her attempts to dispose of me. She valued me until I refused to bare my throat for the blade without a word. Our relationship has come to a dead end. Now the tie between us must be severed."

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ。奴が大胆にも俺を処分しようとするまで、俺は奴を大事にしていた。俺が黙って喉にかかる刃を拒むまで、奴は俺を大事にしていた。俺達の関係はどうにもならないとこまで来ちまった。もうこの絆は絶たなければならない」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Sí. Yo la apreciaba hasta que fue demasiado lejos en sus intentos por deshacerse de mí. Ella me apreciaba hasta que me negué a mostrarle la garganta sin rechistar para que su hoja la cortase. Nuestra relación ha llegado a un punto muerto. Ahora el vínculo que nos une ha de ser cercenado».
languages.original_text: "Yes. I valued her until she went too far in her attempts to dispose of me. She valued me until I refused to bare my throat for the blade without a word. Our relationship has come to a dead end. Now the tie between us must be severed."

traits.locale_text: «Sí. Yo la apreciaba hasta que fue demasiado lejos en sus intentos por deshacerse de mí. Ella me apreciaba hasta que me negué a mostrarle la garganta sin rechistar para que su hoja la cortase. Nuestra relación ha llegado a un punto muerto. Ahora el vínculo que nos une ha de ser cercenado».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Comme vous dites. J'avais beaucoup d'estime pour elle jusqu'à ce qu'elle aille trop loin dans ses tentatives pour m'éliminer. Et de son côté, elle avait de l'estime pour moi jusqu'au jour où j'ai refusé de la laisser m'égorger sans broncher. Notre relation a abouti dans une impasse, et il temps de trancher définitivement nos liens. »
languages.original_text: "Yes. I valued her until she went too far in her attempts to dispose of me. She valued me until I refused to bare my throat for the blade without a word. Our relationship has come to a dead end. Now the tie between us must be severed."

traits.locale_text: « Comme vous dites. J'avais beaucoup d'estime pour elle jusqu'à ce qu'elle aille trop loin dans ses tentatives pour m'éliminer. Et de son côté, elle avait de l'estime pour moi jusqu'au jour où j'ai refusé de la laisser m'égorger sans broncher. Notre relation a abouti dans une impasse, et il temps de trancher définitivement nos liens. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ja. Ich habe sie geschätzt, aber sie wollte mich loswerden und hat es dabei auf die Spitze getrieben. Auch sie hat mich geschätzt, bis ich mich weigerte, meine Kehle für ihre Klinge hinzuhalten. Unsere Beziehung ist mittlerweile an einem toten Punkt angelangt. Es wird Zeit, dass unsere Bande zerschnitten wird."
languages.original_text: "Yes. I valued her until she went too far in her attempts to dispose of me. She valued me until I refused to bare my throat for the blade without a word. Our relationship has come to a dead end. Now the tie between us must be severed."

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Ich habe sie geschätzt, aber sie wollte mich loswerden und hat es dabei auf die Spitze getrieben. Auch sie hat mich geschätzt, bis ich mich weigerte, meine Kehle für ihre Klinge hinzuhalten. Unsere Beziehung ist mittlerweile an einem toten Punkt angelangt." Es wird Zeit, dass unsere Bande zerschnitten wird."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Yes. I valued her until she went too far in her attempts to dispose of me. She valued me until I refused to bare my throat for the blade without a word. Our relationship has come to a dead end. Now the tie between us must be severed."

languages.text: "Evet. Benden kurtulma teşebbüslerinde haddini aşana dek ona kıymet vermiştim. O da tek kelime etmeden boğazımı bıçağının ucuna dayamayı reddedene dek bana kıymet vermişti. İlişkimizde yolun sonuna geldik. Artık aramızdaki bağın kopması gerek."
languages.original_text: "Yes. I valued her until she went too far in her attempts to dispose of me. She valued me until I refused to bare my throat for the blade without a word. Our relationship has come to a dead end. Now the tie between us must be severed."

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
